title: My clients keeps on stop patching at 75%
body: My clients keep on stop patching at 75%. I have tried restarting the client about 3 times and it will continue to stop at 75%, just be applying patch for about 3 hours and I have kept it for 2 hours straight and it still is applying patches forever. Can you guys fix it? My computer is Mac FYI.

replies.body: It felt pretty crappy to see this post and see all of the negative remarks, but I still hope that I can help.  Your specific issues might be due to a poor network that's having trouble specifically staying connecting to our patching servers.  It's being blocked from downloading updates and applying them, so it will get stuck or try to backtrack and fill missed data.  Your best bet would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in top shape.  Good luck!
Sorry about the negative remarks but I just had to say it since negative feedbacks are still a feedback about my experience with league. Thanks for replying. Have a good day.
Me 2 i need help with the Mac logs error. What is logs error no idea . Kelling me
yeah mine has crashed twice now at 37% and its honestly quite annoying.
well riot doesnt care about us so... Imma play overwatch now i think if they dont reply in 12 hours.

yea i'm going to try updating one last time, you know what they say third times the charm... but at least I have almost 200kb download i normally sit at like 120 so a small blessing this goes a bit faster than normal.

TBH this happens nearly every single patch and if they dont fix it, that means that they really dont care about the users. Also, riot doesnt even have a user service or like a number that we can call and ask what to do in person. They are just lazy or know that they are not doing well so they are afraid to get beaten up on the phone.

imagine if they had a number when they did the juggernaut reworks, the fiora splash art debacle, the various champion buffs that people hated. Imagine how many calls they would get of " I HOPE YOU FUCKING IDIOTS DIE IN A FUCKING FIRE" as an example.

and like the past hour we've been talking, Riot didnt even look at this post yet. They are not working at all. Thats why people are starting to leave League now. Zero balnaced patch, screwing up all the item balances, and not reading any of the comments we post.

riot only comments on the posts of if someone had a bug with an RP purchase (money) or something meme related by the community. their is like 3-4 dedicated rioters that spend like a 5-6 hour spree on the boards at least once a weak the main one i think that ive had reply to the most of my issues was @KateyKhaos. god bless that rioter lol.


Also is this the dream?   https://gyazo.com/cebf7a74ad0b28c949d00c3045b696dd  55% now
Mines been at 75 since i wrote this and now its finally 77%
mine is not at 81% with 118 megabytes left.
still 77% now lols Im so done.

sorry to say but I have persevered now to check out new client promptly close and switch to the old one cause sister needs to do homework and I cant play till much later lol.

well im still at 77% and gotta go take my Chinese exam lols see you.
see ya later btw, the intro is so amazing lol
True and also Riot only continues to put on Macro replys that are same even single damm time.

yea i dont trust their support staff anymore had a 3 minute ranked game that was /remade even though no one dced.  our riven went mid and I asked to switch she said no and got killed by the syndra for first blood meanwhile after i walked my slow arse champ (malphite) top and sat their in under tower while teemo pushed the wave we remade and i lost LP. even showed em the video of me walking to mid talking to riven and in /all chat saying GL to the enmy team and i still lost lp.
well they dont work properly and just type in "we're sorry to hear that we will work on it (which means maybe after league server is closed)"
